main event: A luminous, circular object was observed traveling at orbital speed, leaving a glowing trail in the sky.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 6 minutes., It was traveling ESE and maneuvered irregularly., The center of the object appeared clear, similar to a doughnut shape., The sighting coincided with missile activity in the area at the time., TWA and United Air Lines pilots confirmed seeing a strange lighted UFO during the same timeframe.
witness description: pilots from TWA and United Air Lines
